ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] ss boots
ygData.msgSnippet: i m not sure but i think around level 45.  a level 43 friend could not use them though.  and i never use the effect on the legs or boots since it is only 1 per
ygData.messageBody:
i'm not sure but i think around level 45. a level 43 friend could not use
them though. and i never use the effect on the legs or boots since it is
only 1 per cast, so i am not sure they poof when you log but i would think
yes.

Shada

> Hello everyone,
>
> I have been lurking for a long time on this list and want to
> express my
> appreation for all I have learned from everyone here:) Does
> anyone know what
> lvl the singing steel effect works? I know summoning water
> isn't such a big
> deal, but my evil friends are sometimes out or nearly out of
> food and water
> when I hook up with them. Being a baker, I usually have food
> I can give them,
> but being able to summon water for them would sure be nice.
> Does the water
> poof when you log like mage summoned water? Thanks in advance
> for the help.
> Moonspinner
